sentence: Brian Kemp is leveraging his office to strengthen his conservative credentials, Herschel Walker is ignoring his Republican rivals in the U.S. Senate race and tempers are flaring under the Gold Dome.
author: Patricia Murphy
title: Politically Georgia: David Perdue calls in a favor from Donald Trump

sentence: In this episode of the Politically Georgia podcast, AJC political insiders Greg Bluestein and Patricia Murphy breakdown how the Democrat will use the $25 million hes amassed -- and how GOP frontrunner Herschel Walker plans to respond.
author: Patricia Murphy
title: A tidal wave of cash hits Georgias Senate race

sentence: Mallory Blount, an aide to GOP Senate frontrunner Herschel Walker, said if this is your messaging strategy, youre already losing.
author: Greg Bluestein
title: A magician I am not. Warnock tests a different tone

sentence: And if theyre not voting for Brian Kemp, theyre not going to be able to vote for Herschel Walker.? Per Bluestein, Kemp is fighting back, saying in a new statement, "Governor Kemp is laser-focused on uniting Republicans on May 24th to make sure Stacey Abrams is never our governor or the next president."
author: Matthew Chapman
title: Trump tells Perdue tele-rally that Republicans will bomb in Georgia if Brian Kemp is re-nominated

sentence: Georgia Republican Senate candidate Herschel Walker appeared to acknowledge a possible blowout in the primary as he dominates in the polls and invited his GOP opponents, their staff, and supporters to a unity celebration in an effort to bring everyone together on election day.
author: Jacob Bliss
title: Georgia Republican Herschel Walker Invites GOP Opponents to Unity Celebration on Primary Day
